name: cs-date-picker-react
description: "cs-date-picker-react" is a comprehensive npm package designed to streamline date selection processes, offering features such as single or range date selection, customizable date formats, and multi-language support. With built-in functionalities like disabled dates, keyboard navigation, and responsive design, it ensures a seamless user experience across various platforms. Developed with extensive event handling, theme customization, and robust date validation, it simplifies date-related tasks while enhancing accessibility and user satisfaction.
author: PrafulDeore
